name: mobilizon
description: Mobilizon is a decentralized event management and group organizing platform. It allows users to create, manage, and share events in a federated, privacy-friendly environment with custom groups.

features.title: Event Creation
features.description: Organize gatherings with date, location, description, and RSVP tracking for attendee management

features.title: Federation Support
features.description: Share events across Mobilizon instances and discover activities from other federated servers

features.title: Group Management
features.description: Create communities with membership controls, discussion spaces, and shared event calendars

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Set events as public, unlisted, or private to control visibility and attendance permissions

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Collect attendance confirmations and manage participant lists with automatic notifications

features.title: Event Discovery
features.description: Browse public events by location, category, or date to find activities in your area

features.title: Recurring Events
features.description: Schedule repeating activities with customizable frequency and exception handling

features.title: Activitypub Integration
features.description: Connect with the fediverse to reach wider audiences beyond your local instance
